entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 10:29 PM MST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 10:29 PM MST Saturday 07 January 2023
